item.title: Hoops at Hammond 3v3 Basketball Tournament
item.description: Join us at Hammond Park for a day of hoops, community, and great vibes. Visit the City's website for more information.

item.title: Juneteenth Celebration
item.description: The Juneteenth Celebration will include educational activities and more! This family-friendly event is free and open to the public.

item.title: Movies by Moonlight 2025
item.description: Enjoy a movie on the big screen under a beautiful night sky! Admission is free.

item.title: City Green Live: Moon Taxi
item.description: Nashville based indie alt-rock band Moon Taxi is back with tracks ranging from rock to synth to pop to bluegrass, delivered with a polished, classic sound. The band freed themselves from the barriers of genre and self-definition, and their sixth album, Set Yourself Free, showcases the skill of a fully developed and practiced group of musicians without boundaries.
